SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth

Class DigestMD5

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth.DigestMD5
Direct Known Subclasses:
DigestMD5Client, DigestMD5Server
public abstract class DigestMD5 extends Object
Digest-MD5 authentication mechanism.

This provides common functionalities for both client and server implementations.

It automatically constructs an instance of SecureRandom.

This can be overridden from an extension by providing a Random instance.

See Also:
  • RFC 2831
  • Random
  • SecureRandom
